user_id.description: User ID.  Provide a value of `0` to operate the current session's user.

cursor.description: Used for pagination.  When a list request has more records available, cursors are provided in the response headers `X-Files-Cursor-Next` and `X-Files-Cursor-Prev`.  Send one of those cursor value here to resume an existing list from the next available record.  Note: many of our SDKs have iterator methods that will automatically handle cursor-based pagination.

per_page.description: Number of records to show per page.  (Max: 10,000, 1,000 or less is recommended).

sort_by.description: If set, sort records by the specified field in either `asc` or `desc` direction (e.g. `sort_by[bundle_id]=desc`). Valid fields are `bundle_id`.

bundle_id.description: If set, return records where the specified field is equal to the supplied value.

filter.description: If set, return records where the specified field is equal to the supplied value. Valid fields are `bundle_id`.

$ul: **notify_on_registration**: Triggers bundle notification when a registration action occurs for it.
**notify_on_upload**: Triggers bundle notification when a upload action occurs for it.
**user_id**: The id of the user to notify.
